articles.author: Jagmeet Singh, Ivan Mehta
articles.title: Truecaller brings real-time caller ID to iPhone users - TechCrunch
articles.description: Truecaller for iOS has been updated with live caller ID support for its premium iPhone users.
articles.content: Popular caller ID app Truecaller has long left iPhone users at a disadvantage by not offering the caller information in real-time a feature its Android users have enjoyed for some time. Today, that c… [+3633 chars]

articles.title: Scientists succeed in trapping molecules to perform quantum operations for the first time - Phys.org
articles.description: Molecules haven't been used in quantum computing, even though they have the potential to make the ultra-high-speed experimental technology even faster. Their rich internal structures were seen as too complicated, too delicate, too unpredictable to manage, so …

articles.title: Mysterious Space Signal Traced Across the Universe to an Ancient Dead Galaxy - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Astronomers have traced a mysterious fast radio burst to an unexpected place — an ancient, massive galaxy far removed from active star formation. This revelation shakes up the conventional wisdom that such cosmic phenomena exclusively arise from younger, star…
articles.content: Discovering a fast radio burst in an old, distant galaxy challenges the belief that these events are exclusive to young, vibrant galaxies, suggesting a deeper, cosmic puzzle about their true origins … [+8308 chars]

articles.author: James Waldron
articles.title: HHS gives Moderna $590M to 'accelerate' bird flu vaccine trials - Fierce Biotech
articles.description: The U.S. | The government wants Moderna to push forward with various bird flu vaccines as well as mRNA shots for other influenza strains with pandemic potential.
